price: Kisha juu yake wanyweshwe mchanganyo wa maji yamoto yaliyo chemka.
arabic: ثُمَّ إِنَّ لَهُمۡ عَلَيۡهَا لَشَوۡبٗا مِّنۡ حَمِيمٖ
footnotes: Kisha washirikina hao juu ya kula mti wa Zaqqum watapewa maji yaliyo changanywa, yamoto, ya kuwababua nyuso zao, na kukatakata matumbo yao.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: thumma inna lahum ʿalayhā lashawban min ḥamīmin
